overview:
Dan co-founded Fairhaven Capital in 2007 after joining TD Capital Ventures in 2006. He manages the Fairhaven investments in Verdasys, Makana, Everyzing and Xtranormal.

He was the Chairman and CEO of iPhrase Technologies (acquired by IBM), and a Venture Partner at Greylock where he served on the Boards of Mazu Networks, and Reflectent Software. Dan was a VP at Cisco Systems, the CEO of WebLine Communications (acquired by Cisco), and President of Avid Technology. He held senior positions at Gateway Design Automation (acquired by Cadence Systems), Racal-Redac Inc. and Pixel Computer, Inc. Dan earned BS and MS in finance from Bentley College, where he currently serves as a Trustee.
